alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:14AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Norfolk, central Plymouth, northwestern Bristol and northeastern Providence Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 414 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norton, or near Taunton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Plymouth, Taunton, Weymouth, Braintree, Cumberland, Randolph, North Attleborough, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Attleboro, Mansfield, Middleborough, Easton, Hingham, Norton, Scituate, Pembroke and Sharon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
